## Quarto

Files before 2007 were stored as scanned pdf tables. Some were successfully converted to excel files but other had to be entered manually. Thats is why the process is different and some variables can be missing

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(conflicted)
library(progressr)
conflict_prefer("mutate", "dplyr")


source(here::here("R","extract_functions.R"))
source(here::here("R","revalue_variables.R"))

#identify particular status in Grupo column
dispersers<-c("OUT","Out","out","disp","Disp","DISP","OUT PT","Grace-disp
","Alex-disp","28/01/13", "saiu","Expulsa")
solo<-c("Sozinha","Sozinho","sozinha","sozinho","SOZINHA","soz.","SOZINHO",
        "Soz.")
dead<-c("DEAD","died","Died","DIED")
names<-c("chiquinho","Georgia","Luisa","Antônia","Luana",
         "Camilo","André")
#list all files
files<-list.files(here::here("data","RawData","pdfData","ok"),
                  pattern = "xls",recursive=T,
                  full.names = T)

DATA.OLD<- purrr::map_dfr(files, extract_long_data,.progress=T)

data.clean.old<-DATA %>% 
            revalue_region() %>% 
      #      revalue_birth() %>%    
            revalue_stage() %>% 
            revalue_sex() %>% 
            revalue_name() %>% 
            dplyr::arrange(GLT,DateObs)


sort(unique(data.clean.old$Region))
sort(unique(data.clean.old$Group))

save(data.clean.old,file=here::here("Data","NewlyCreatedData","all_long_old.RData"))


bad<-c("?","T0","IN","AF?","?-3","FT","?-1","?-2" ,"?-4","?-5","?-6" )

data.clean.old %>%
    dplyr::filter(Disp=="0" & Death=="0" & !GLT %in% bad) %>% 
    dplyr::group_by(DateObs,GLT) %>%
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") %>%
    dplyr::filter(n > 1L & GLT!="?" & GLT!="T0" & GLT!="IN" & 
                    GLT!="FT")

dup<-data.clean.old %>%
    dplyr::filter(Disp=="0" & Death=="0" & GLT!="?" & GLT!="T0" & GLT!="IN" & 
                    GLT!="FT") %>% 
    dplyr::group_by(DateObs,GLT) %>%
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") %>%
    dplyr::filter(n > 1L) # & GLT!="?" & GLT!="T0" & GLT!="IN") %>% 

dups<-data.clean.old %>% 
  dplyr::filter(GLT %in% dup$GLT) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(GLT, DateObs)


```
